snippet: With the Range Rover Evoque, Land Rover makes a play for buyers looking for a lighter, more fuel-efficient sport utility vehicle.
abstract: With the Range Rover Evoque, Land Rover makes a play for buyers looking for a lighter, more fuel-efficient sport utility vehicle.
lead_paragraph: In Sunday's Automobiles section, Christopher Jensen reviews the Range Rover Evoque, a relatively lithe sport utility vehicle from a marque traditionally associated with chunky, if plush, utility machines.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
